Title: Room
Overview: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.
Keywords: based on novel, carpet, isolation, kidnapping, imprisonment, grandparents, escape, hospital, dog, captive, mother son relationship, shed, skylight
production_companies: Téléfilm Canada, Film 4, Element Pictures, Irish Film Board, FilmNation Entertainment, No Trace Camping, A24, Elevation Pictures
Cast: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Joan Allen
